MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
Fraz-Urb'luu's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23). Fraz-Urb'luu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: alter self (can become Medium-sized when changing his appearance), detect magic, dispel magic, phantasamal force 3/day each: confusion, dream, mislead, programmed illusion, seeming 1/day each: mirage arcane, modify memory, project image

MonsterTrait.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: If Fraz-Urb'luu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: Fraz-Urb'luu has advantage on saving throws against spell and other magic effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Undetectable
MonsterTrait.Text: Fraz-Urb'luu can't be targeted by divination magic, perceived through magical scrying sensors, or detected by abilities that sense demons or fiends.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: Fraz-Urb'luu makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his fists.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Fist
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (4d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterTrait.Text: Fraz-Urb'luu can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creautre's turn. Fraz-Urb'luu regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

MonsterAction.Name: Tail
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also grappled (escape DC 24). The grappled target is also restrained. Fraz-Urb'luu can grapple only one creature with his tail at a time.

MonsterTrait.Name: Phantasmal Killer (Costs 2 Actions)
MonsterTrait.Text: Fraz-Urb'luu casts phantasmal killer, no concentration required.
